definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Older singletons are using the sites as a way to find love.
sentences.chinese: 孤寡老人使用此類網站尋找真愛。

sentences.english: Don't say that there is no true love, don't let others mistook you seen it all.
sentences.chinese: 別說這世間沒有真愛，不要讓別人誤以爲你閱人無數。

sentences.english: Without true love we just exist, Alfie.
sentences.chinese: 沒有真愛，我們只是白活，阿飛。

sentences.english: The road to love is never smooth.
I used to hide my love carefully, then tasted lonely.
sentences.chinese: 我曾慣於掩藏真愛，然後品着孤獨。

sentences.english: True love can take many forms.
Perhaps your love is still waiting for you the next hours.
sentences.chinese: 也許你的真愛還在下一秒等着你。

sentences.english: For some, they finally find their one and only true love.
sentences.chinese: 對於一些人，他們最終會找到他們的另一半和真愛。

sentences.english: Only an act of true love can thaw a frozen heart.
sentences.chinese: 唯有真愛才能夠融化冰凍的心。

sentences.english: How I how bad, but to you all is true love.
sentences.chinese: 怎麼我怎麼壞，但對你一切都是真愛。

sentences.english: I think the young love can sometimes be the most important.
sentences.chinese: 但是我想真愛的關鍵在於兩情相悅。

sentences.english: The outcome ranges between a total disaster and a terrible heart ache to wonderful love stories that are pure, genuine, emotional-fulfilling and highly sexual.
sentences.chinese: 結果不外乎就是災難心痛分手和靈慾合一的真愛之間。

sentences.english: Women especially can get confused by the physical bond between themselves and their partners and confuse it with real love.
sentences.chinese: 女人尤其容易把雙方的生理吸引與真愛搞混淆。

sentences.english: So tell me have you ever really - really really ever loved a woman?
sentences.chinese: 那麼現在，告訴我，你是否曾經正真愛上過一個女人？

sentences.english: This life left no time for spiritual growth or true love.
sentences.chinese: 這種生活不會有心靈成長的時間或者真愛。

sentences.english: If what you felt then was true love , then it's never too …
sentences.chinese: 如果那時你感受到是真愛，那就永遠不會太遲。

definition: lit. that person/fig. the person you have been looking for/Mr Right/the girl of one's dreams
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
fate or chance that brings people together/predestined affinity or relationship/(Budd.) destiny
to fall in love with/to be in love with
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
